charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1101_0100_20:
In a tournament for powerful Trainers,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw the sparkle
of Red Terastallizing his Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1101_0200_20: And after the tournament was over...
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_0400_10:
You’re so skilled at Mega Evolving,
Dynamaxing, AND Terastallizing!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_0500_10:
You never stop pushing yourself, and you
keep adding more tools to your arsenal.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_0600_10:
Just how ripe are your skills gonna get,
Red?!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_0301_0700_10: He really is a living legend!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_0401_0800_10:
If you’re the best of the best—to the point
you’re called a legend—your power just
keeps evolving!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_0402_1000_10:
You bet it is! You know us Kanto Trainers
are always the ones on top!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_0402_1100_10:
I guess your skills are an inspiration to
everyone, eh?
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1200_10:
Red! Blue! I wanna keep getting stronger
and stronger, just like you!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1500_10:
But don’t think we’re just gonna sit around
and let you overtake us!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1600_10:
While we’re on the subject... Red, why’d you
decide to master Terastallizing?
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1700_10:
Red’s battled a lot of strong opponents since
he arrived here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1800_10:
And he’s suffered defeats here because he
was up against styles and moves he’d never
seen before.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_1900_10:
He became jealous! He wanted to learn new
techniques, too!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2000_10:
So he trained hard to be able to Terastallize
in battle.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2200_10: I see. So defeat can help a person grow.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2300_10: I’ve experienced something like that myself.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2400_10:
I grew a LOT from all my battles with my
rivals!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2500_10:
That experience is my greatest treasure,
shining just as blazingly bright as
Terastallizing!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2600_10:
Yep. I too understand just how valuable
those experiences are.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2700_10:
And I’ve learned so much from both you and
Red since I met you here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2800_10:
Like how when you want to express how
you feel...words are unnecessary!
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_2900_10:
If you REALLY want someone to understand
something, they’ll get it, even if you never
say a word.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_3000_10: Looks like these two are all fired up.
charaepi_ch0000_40_red/2301_1201_3100_10:
We’re thinking the same thing! We’re
definitely gonna have a Pokémon battle!
